comments: Robinson (MIA) establishes himself in a legal picking position in Grant's (DET) path and does not deliver any contact.
Dragic (MIA) legally contests Ellington's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Rose (DET) maintains a legal guarding position on Nunn (MIA) during the drive.
Plumlee (DET) trips on his own and any contact by Adebayo (MIA) is incidental.
Harkless (MIA) makes contact to Grant's (DET) arm before any contact with the ball and it causes Grant to lose control of the ball.
Grant (DET) makes contact with Adebayo's (MIA) lower body and dislodges him.
Adebayo (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position on Grant (DET) during the drive.
Harkless (MIA) momentarily places an arm around Plumee (DET) then quickly removes it without affecting his FOM.
Harkless (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position and does not make contact with Grant's (DET) arm during his driving shot attempt.
Robinson (MIA) establishes himself in a legal picking position in Grant's (DET) path and does not deliver any contact.
Adebayo (MIA) legally firms up in Ellington's (DET) path and does not deliver any contact during the pick.
Dragic (MIA) extends his leg and initiates marginal lower body contact with Plumlee (DET) during the jump shot attempt.
Ellington (DET) fumbles the ball and does not take a controlled dribble before regaining possession.
Adebyao (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position and cleanly blocks Grant's (DET) driving shot attempt.
Plumlee (DET) swipes down and makes contact to Dragic's (MIA) arm.  Dragic calls for timeout prior to the foul call, but a foul is called instead of granting the timeout.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact with Rose's (DET) hand/wrist that affects his ability to completely follow through during his jump shot attempt.
Ellington (DET) makes marginal contact with Adebayo (MIA) on the catch.
Ellington (DET) commits a take foul on Adebayo (MIA).
Griffin (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Dragic's (MIA) path and the two players make incidental leg contact as Dragic goes around the screen.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Mykhailiuk (DET) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds. Possession is correctly awarded to MIA.
